amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-109 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 1, 3, 4, 5, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 18, 19, 25, 26, 30, 31, 35, 38, 40, 45, 49, 54, 63, 64, 83, 86, 88, 90, 91, 98, 99, and 100.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised amendments numbered 1, 3, 4, 5, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 18, 19, 25, 26, 30, 31, 35, 38, 40, 45, 49, 54, 63, 64, 83, 86, 88, 90, 91, 98, 99, and 100 printed in Part B of House Report 117-109.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 203 (Roll no. 227).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
